name: BLColorPicker

”Alexa, pick a color with Color Picker”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color picker
des: Having trouble picking a color? Have Color Picker pick a random color for you, or any number of colors!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
